column1: Now you have a machine gun. Ho-Ho-Ho.
Left/Right Click or Use Arrow Keys To Cycle Screens, ESC to Exit

Scoot Hard DX can be configured using the menus.

Press Escape to bring up the menu. Press F1 to bring up this screen.

NEW GAME: starts a new game. Pick your difficulty and go.
GAME STATES: save your current game, or load a current one.
Previous saves don't work between versions of the game.
OPTIONS: configure and tweak Scoot Hard DX or GZDoom
HELP SCREEN: this help screen
CREDITS: the people who worked on the game.
EXIT TO SYSTEM: exit the game

You are Scootaloo. Your mission is to escape
the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation and take down
the baddies running it. It won't be easy though.

Reading this will give you hot tips(TM).

You can only carry one of each of the missile, weather and
big weapons. You can carry a blaster and SMG at the same
time.

Either use up your shots first, or swap it out by walking over
another weapon and pressing the use key (default is E) to swap
it out. The dropped weapon will contain the ammo as well. If you
pick up the same weapon you currently have, you will pick up
the ammo from it rather than swap it out.

Bullet Weapons:
Blaster - You start with this weapon. Never runs out of ammo.
Submachine Gun - Rapid fire goodness. Infinite ammo.

Missile Launcher

Primary Fire - Shoots a straight firing missile.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a grenade that can bounce around.

A basic rocket launcher.

Contains 10 shots.

FillySeeker

Primary Fire - Shoots a heat-seeking missile at the cost
of 1 shot.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a cluster grenade at the cost
of 4 shots.

A modified rocket launcher meant for crowd control.

Contains 8 shots.

Hailer

Primary Fire - Shoots a single freezing hail cores at the
cost of 1 shot.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a spread of freezing hail cores
at the cost of 5 shots.

Enemies that can freeze will freeze solid.

Contains 40 shots.

Lightning Gun

Primary Fire - Shoots a volley of five lightning balls at the cost
of 5 shots per volley.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a projectile that destroys projectiles
and rips through enemies at the cost of 25 shots.

This weapon can overcharge certain enemies.

Contains 75 shots.

Rainbower

Primary Fire - Shoots a projectile that generates wave of rainbows
when it hits the floor.
Secondary Fire - Shoot ripping projectiles in a semi-circle in the air.

This weapon can atomize most enemies.

Contains 5 shots.

Tornadozer

Primary Fire - Shoots mini-tornadoes in rapid succession at the cost of
2 shots.
Secondary Fire - Shoots a tornado that homes in on targets at the cost
of 10 shots.

This weapon tears most enemies apart.

Contains 60 shots.

Vending Machines cost 1 bit for an apple, 5 for a hot meal on
Easy. This is increased by 3x on Medium, and 5x on Hard and
Discourse. On Discourse coins are very rare, making using
vending machines less of an option. Whee for capitalism!
(Note: Sanya is not a Communist either so hush)

To use a vending machine, go up to one and press use. If
you don't have enough bits, or aren't hungry, it will tell you so.

Destroy up anything that moves and get to the exit.

Find secrets along the way. Check for pushwalls.
These can contain hidden caches of goods. Also always
check the vent ducts. Always.

On some levels it might be a bit more complex than that,
namely the Pegasus Device. It shouldn't be too hard to blow it
up unless you work for Polygon. Just look around the place for
ways to destroy it.

On some levels there might be a Boss enemy. This enemy is
tougher than a normal enemy and is necessary to beat the level
and progress. They have specific patterns you must master and
look out for.

Red, Green and Blue Keys are required to unlock areas of the
level. To unlock most exits, you must find a Management Key.
This also can be used to unlock the safety protocols on the
Pegasus Device.

Scootaloo can't fly, but she can glide. Jump and hold down the
jump key (default is spacebar) and move forward to glide around.
Some secrets require being able to master this. Try doing some
neat tricks.

Scootaloo can equip three armor types.

Basic Armor - Provides 25 points of all three armors.
Bulletproof Armor - Provides 50 points of bullet armor.
Fireproof Armor - Provides 50 points of fire armor.
Weatherproof Armor - Provides 50 points of weather armor.
Super Armor - Provides 100 points of all three armors.

Occasionally you might find hidden, or in plain sight,
mystical buckets of chicken labeled 'EFS'. These Eldritch
buckets of chicken grant you the ability to become
an invincible chicken for about half a minute.

Fire - Peck their brains out!
Alt Fire - channel all your power into a Clustercluck. This
reverts you back after.
Press use (default: E) on some posters to get important tips.
Heat up applesauce with explosives to get more health.
Most exits are locked by a Management Access Card.
There are hazardous wires in some areas.
Some can be shut off with switches.
Use vending machines to get food in exchange for bits.
Spectra pools are hurtful to the touch.
Most weapons have an alt-fire (default: RMB). Check them out!
Hold down jump (default: space) and move to glide around.
You can also look around while doing this.
Master the movement to overpower your enemies.
Press use (default: E) to swap between a weapon on the floor.
You can only carry one of each weapon type.
However, you can still pick up current weapons for ammo.
Scootaloo: I Gotta Get Outta Here!
Scootaloo: What have they done to you?
Scootaloo: Why are you locked in a bathroom?
Scootaloo: Aw, banged yourself up real bad, huh?
Scootaloo: Aw, who's that pretty lady?
Scootaloo: I Gotta Stop This! They're going to flood the dam!
Scootaloo: Water you waiting for, Atmosphere?!
Cancer Mouse: I want to I want to talk to you about something all the kids love. My Little Pony.
Scootaloo: Oh, that wasn't so bad!
Scootaloo: Oh please make it stop...

Cancer Mouse: Now 4Chan found this radio show host called Ghost, and he claimed to never watch My Little Pony, but it's obvious that he's seen season 2 because...
Scootaloo: Can we not do this, like, ever. I'm really busy, I gotta find my friends and bust outta here.
Scootaloo: Can we not do this, like, ever. I'm really busy, I gotta find my friends and bust outta here.
Cancer Mouse: Oh, and I thought you were a melting pot of friendship!
Scootaloo: I don't have time for this! I'm done! Stick a fork in me! I'm DONE.
Scootaloo: We'll see about that you crazy bucker!
Scootaloo: Say hello to your wife for me!
Scootaloo: Time to put an end to this...
Scootaloo: Woah, what kind of deformed mess are YOU?
Ilse: I dunno, one that can fly?
Scootaloo: Maimbow, you're going to pay for what you've done!
Scootaloo: Give it up for Scoots!
Surprise: I'm done playing nice! DROP THE FLOOR.
Dr. Atmosphere: Hello Scootaloo. It seems you're making a mess of this place. Oh, where are my manners. Let me introduce myself. I am Dr. Atmosphere, the head engineer of this facility.
Dr. Atmosphere: I'm also the husband of Surprise... you know, the business mare you slaughtered escaping the factory. I'm going to make you really regret coming out of your mother's wretched womb...
Dr. Atmosphere: I’M GONNA ENJOY THROWING YOU INTO THE PEGASUS DEVICE PUSSY FIRST. AND ENJOY SEEING YOUR HAM SLICES GET PULLED IN.

Dr. Atmosphere: I see that you've made quite the mess on your little crusade. It's no matter, all will be repaired in time. I really hope you know that there is no stopping the Pegasus race. We'll continue on, without you that is.
Dr. Atmosphere: You impudent mule! You're going to die soon. Where the others have failed, I won't! I will gut you myself.
Dr. Atmosphere: I'm going to ask you to leave.
Dr. Atmosphere: You're all going to die up here.
Dr. Atmosphere: You should know it wasn't my idea to unleash the enforcers on you. It was Maimbow's. However, I have something else in mind for you. [cackles]
Dr. Atmosphere: I'm not going to lie, I miss Surprise. You took her from me...
Dr. Atmosphere: [laughs maniacally] She's not dead, she can't be dead. I'll save her, I'll crush you, I'll crush you all, and I'll save her, and you won't leave the factory!

Maimbow: Hello there Scootaloo. I am Maimbow Undash. You probably have figured out that I'm not your big sister... In fact, you could probably say I am your worst nightmare. Once I've dealt with you, I'm going to make Aurora watch... doesn't that sound delightful? [laughs]
Maimbow: You know, I never gave you the chance to say goodbye to Orion. I apologize for being so rude, you can have him, [laughs].
Maimbow: How does it feel to kill one of your best friends? I think he said “I love you” while you slaughtered him. I hope you're happy with yourself.
Maimbow: Turn back now Scootaloo. You have no idea who or what you're messing with. We will prevail! We will win!
Maimbow: No! STOP. Don't touch that!
Maimbow: You bitch! YOU RUINED EVERYTHING! I WILL KILL YOU WITH MY BARE HOOVES FOR THAT.

Maimbow: I SPENT YEARS PLANNING MY REVENGE... I SPENT YEARS PLOTTING WITH OTHER PEGASI JUST LIKE ME TO PUT AN END TO INCOMPETENT FUCKS LIKE YOU. AND WHAT? FOR NOTHING. NO, YOU CANNOT STOP ME, I AM A GOD, AND I WILL SMITE YOU IF IT'S THE LAST THING I DO.

Maimbow: You know... I'm not even mad... If I can kill you, all this will be worth it. All that matters is if you die and I can shame Rainbow Dash for what she did to me! She will see me for what I am, a god. [chuckles]
Maimbow: I see that you've made it to my lair. You know I have a little surprise for you. Consider it a gift, before your untimely demise [laughs].
Maimbow: Welcome, Scootaloo, to your surprise. We have a second device that is better than the first one. It's only a prototype, but I will finish it. But first... you must die!
Maimbow: YOU FOOL. YOU CANNOT DESTROY ME, I AM A GOD!
Maimbow: I don't care if it's not ready, I'm turning this thing on... and you're going in it, and that other bitch too!
???: Let’s keep this conversation a bit more, grounded [evil laughter]
???: Welcome Scootaloo, to your personal hell.

???: I see that you’ve made it through my playground. Who I am is not important, what matters is this. The fate of this universe rests on your shoulders. It is vital that you save your friend, Aurora. If you fail to save her, then life as we know it will be in grave danger. That is all I can do to help. Remember, you must save Aurora.
Go to GZDoom Options (Advanced) for more settings

Easy Mode. Fewest enemies, lowest aggression, less damage taken, and enemies have lower health. You'll probably want this skill Eri.
Medium Mode. A few more enemies, normal damage and health, and bumped up aggression. Vending machines cost 3x more.
Hard Mode. Enemy count is much higher, and they do more damage and have higher health. Vending machines cost 5x more.
Discourse Mode. Aggression is much higher, enemies are maxed out on health. Not only do vending machines cost 5x more, but coins are rarer now. Only the most epic of gamers will play on this skill.

Due to their importance in controlling weather and other divine areas of expertise, there's a certain bit of nationalism within the Pegasus race. This is especially true within the proud city of Cloudsdale. However, something in the recent past changed that made this even more profound.
Pegasi across Equestria were suddenly required to do intensive fitness exams. If they failed, they were incarcerated at the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation.

Meet Scootaloo. Despite being trained by the exceptional Rainbow Dash, she failed her exams. Not only her, but her friends Orion Solstice and Aurora Dawn. The feds rolled in to cart them away, but Scootaloo didn't take that sitting down. She caused a distraction and escaped.

A guard chased her down, so she had to wrestle him in the construction zone before overpowering him. The two fell down a ventilation shaft thirty floors to the surface - to the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation's ground location.
Fortunately for Scootaloo, she survived the fall. The guard was not so lucky.
She found a two-way CB radio, a utility belt, and a hoof blaster on the dead guard. Surely she could use those to contact someone to help her. However, she couldn't get a signal from there.

Arming herself with the blaster and utility belt, she saw a door ahead of her. Her goal was simple: survive. rescue Orion and Aurora if she could. There was no telling what unspeakable nightmares she'd encounter.
Scootaloo took a breather after enduring the heated battle with Surprise and her platoon of Rocket Guards. She could hardly believe it herself. She spotted the exit behind Surprise's mosh pit.
She climbed a radio tower and signaled for help. She managed to get a hold of someone, but it was going to take a while for reinforcements to arrive. Scootaloo was on her own.

Eventually, she found a computer room. One of the screens lit up.

"Why, hello there Scootaloo."

The aqua green pony looked like a bastardized version of Rainbow Dash. Scootaloo was shocked and confused.

"Who are you?"

The rainbow-maned pony didn't acknowledge.
"Surrender now, Scootaloo. There's nowhere to go. This factory will be your grave.
"I don't need to kill you yet... I can kill one of your friends first. Doesn't that sound fun?" They let out a menacing laugh.
Scootaloo knew what she had to do. She had to get them back for sure. Little did she know what fears and horrors would await her...
Dr. Atmosphere, the head engineer, needed to act fast. Scootaloo was approaching at a rapid pace. He asked the rainbow-maned Pegasus for advice.

They calmly contemplated for a moment.

"Release the enforcers."

Dr. Atmosphere was reluctant at first. "They're a wee bit unstable; we need more time to test them."

The multicolored Pegasus was not having it. "I don't care. Do it now."

Dr. Atmosphere chuckled a bit and gave the Pegasus an unusual-looking amulet. "Okay then, but I'm warning you..."
The totalitarian Pegasus put it on, and let out a scream of agonizing pain.

Scootaloo took the teleporter back to the main facility after killing the deranged Dr. Atmosphere. She saw a television screen there. On it was the head pony - the one that looked like Rainbow Dash. They had Orion Solstice over the gaping maw of a machine.
"Scootaloo, you killed my top engineer... you ruined me; now I'll ruin you!"

Orion looked at the screen. "Don't worry, Scoots. I love you! Kick flank! Goodbye."

Before she could say goodbye back, Orion was dropped into the device.
The machine spat out bright components - mainly red. All that was pumped into a nightmarish contraption.
"You see, Scoots, that's what you get for crossing me. If you don't surrender, it's going to be Aurora next!"

Scootaloo, trying not to cry at the loss of her friend, raised the CB radio to her mouth and used it.

"Go buck yourself..."

At this point, Scootaloo had one goal in mind...

"They must die for what they did to Orion. And that machine must be destroyed before it causes even more death."

Scootaloo went through a teleporter. It took her, not to another part of the facility, but to Cloudsdale's outer reaches...

Scootaloo found herself inside of a hellish landscape.

How she got here was a mystery, but one thing was certain...

This was no place for the living...

Maimbow prepared to take on Scootaloo. In his preoccupation, Aurora managed to slip away and hide somewhere. Will Scootaloo be able to save her, or will she meet a terrible fate like Orion did?

Maimbow was armed to the teeth. And he was not going to go down easily. It was do or die.

Scootaloo stood over the dying body of Maimbow Undash. He dropped the amulet, as well as a rose colored contact lens. His cutie mark wore off. It was painted over.

Scootaloo recognized it. It was Lightning Dust. She had disguised herself!

Scootaloo was in shock.

"Why, Lightning Dust?"

"Because your big sister ruined me! What better way than to ruin her legacy? I wanted her to suffer...

"So I worked my way up the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation ladder and hatched a plan… to get back at not just her... but you as well!"

Scootaloo took a step back. She couldn't believe it.

"You did all this just to get back at us? Ponies have died because of you!"

Maimbow started to falter. "I know... I let hate overflow me... and for that, I have paid the price."

Scootaloo stood in awe as Maimbow laid in his own blood.

"You see, Scootaloo, I knew you wouldn't pass those required exams... so I knew you'd end up here. I'd be able to destroy you in that machine... and then I could some day amass an army to take down Rainbow Dash to tell her it was all her fault!"

Maimbow chuckled. "I was such a fool. I let my hate blind me."
Maimbow faltered as he lost more blood. "Forgive me... please… whatever awaits me beyond this, I deserve and am ready for."
Scootaloo contemplated for a moment. She couldn't bear to think about all the pain and misery Maimbow had brought her. She lost two of her friends to this bastard.

She had her answer.

"You know what, you're right. I'll forgive you..."

Maimbow was thrown into the second barely functional Pegasus Device, head first. The machine puked out every color known to Pegasuskind. Scootaloo knew what she had to do.

The Pegasus race was too sick to save. It was disgraced by the actions of the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation.

It needed to be purged.

She got control of the Enforcers using Maimbow's amulet and later took control of the Spectrawasps.

She swore to exterminate every last pegasus in Equestria and beyond, starting with the remaining forces of the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation. Those  chose to surrender were lobotomized, and forced to serve in her burning crusade.

The loss of Orion and Aurora had pushed Scootaloo to insanity.

Once she was done with the Pegasus race, no one knew what horrific crimes she'd continue to commit against life itself for the remainder of her lifetime.

Scootaloo is no more. Her soul is but a fleeting memory, and her body an empty husk of her former self. All that remains is Absentia.

Here she will continue her war against life itself… In the Rainbow Factory... where not a single soul gets through.
Aurora, who had been quiet, spoke up. "Maimbow, I forgive you. I believe love can conquer all evils in this world... If I were to let hate consume me, I'd be no better than you."
Scootaloo thought for a moment. She then spoke up. "Aurora's right. I must end the cycle of hate somewhere. However, rest assured, I'm going to help ensure this never happens anywhere again. Got it?"
Maimbow shed a tear. "Rainbow did good."
He gasped his last breath, before his life slowly faded from his body.
Scootaloo saw the amulet that Maimbow dropped. It had a weird symbol on it. It appeared to be what Maimbow used to control the Enforcers. She broke it in hopes of freeing them.

Scootaloo, with a renewed sense of purpose, looked at her friend. The two had survived the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation.

"Wow, we did it." She said to Aurora.

"So, what now?" asked Aurora.

Scootaloo then asked, “Want to grab a bite to eat?”

“Sure” said Aurora, “I heard there’s this new barbecue restaurant that’s really good.”

Scootaloo and Aurora made a promise that day to each other: they'd remember Orion, and never forget what happened there.

However, they also found it in their hearts to forgive and learn from this. Equestria would recover.

Creative Director,
Art and Level Design

Voice of Female Low Guards,
Aurora Dawn
Voice of High Guards, Dr. Atmosphere

Apeirogon
